summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2002 BLUE BIRD ALL AMERICAN.  THE DIESEL ENGINE LIFT PUMP LEAKS DOWN ONTO THE STARTER AND EXHAUST.  THE CONTACT SPOKE WITH A REPRESENTATIVE FROM CUMMINGS REGARDING THE WARRANTY AND EXPLAINED THAT THE LIFT PUMP HAD BEEN REPLACED THREE TIMES IN ONE YEAR.  THE REPRESENTATIVE STATED THAT NOTHING COULD BE DONE AND THERE WAS NO RECALL FOR THE LIFT PUMP.  THE ENGINE SIZE, NUMBER OF CYLINDERS, AND POWERTRAIN WERE UNKNOWN.  THE CURRENT AND FAILURE MILEAGES WERE 27,975.
